text: stos Realignment will allow the four Densities of the planetary system to re-connect to the Density-5 Kee-Ra-ShA Primal Light Fields and the Khundaray Primal Sound Fields beyond the Time Matrix. Through this “Divine Connection”, the Planetary Shields of Earth- Tara-Gaia can receive perpetual circulation of the “Rainbow Ray” Primal Creation Currents from Source. Once the natural Density-4, D-12 Planetary Maharic Shield is restored on Earth, Density-3 Gaia, Density-2 Tara and Density-1 Earth will be restored to the status of Ascension Planets (see Page 167), their inherent life-fields capable of attaining full Ascension out of the Time Matrix. Until the Christos Realignment of Earth is completed, most of Earth’s life-field is trapped in time within the finite experience of Density manifesta- tion, unable to enjoy the Divinely Given Gift of self-motivated Ascension 283
